data.title: Just what I needed
data.text:
I travelled a lot today, arrived at the end of the day to this hotel for the first time. They had a Happy Birthday sign, a very large cake at the front desk area. This was their one year anniversary. I never knew this hotel was brand new.

As I entered I received all the pleasantly, they always appreciate my platinum elite status which in simple terms mean that I sleep in hotels more nights than I sleep at my own bed!

The rooms are designed wonderfully, very warm and welcoming, spacious, have full size refrigerators, working space and everything designed ergonomically for someone like me who will work hours at the desks every night before going to bed. I am impressed for the price per night for what I am getting.

Tonight, every room is sold out in most hotels for some reason in Shreveport I do not have a clue. I live in my own world. But the staff at the front desk was not turning anyone away. They were calling hotel after hotel to find a room for every guest that walked in. They were pleasant, patient and professional. 

My room had a little inconvenience, they corrected it immediately by going out of their way. I am coming back to stay here on my next visit. Steps away from the Bass Pro Shop and Louisiana Board Walk, I don't think you can beat this by any means.

I give this hotel a big four in my rating. You have come here and stay to find how wonderful this place is! Seriously!

data.title: Studio are well designed
data.text:
We have stayed one night in a studio and they are really well designed. The proportion of the space is well displayed and it was clean. No bathrobe!
However kitchen is well equipped. 
No restaurant or room service and when you ask reception they are not able to advice you a delivery (they do it I have found on Google)
No security to go up in the room so everybody can take the lift!
Fitness is 4 cardio machines and it feels empty

data.title: World Class Customer Service at Residence Inn
data.text: This hotel is very clean and the staff is very well trained. Right next to a lot of stores and restaurants.(Boardwalk) Makes this a great destination place. I was very impressed with check in and a young lady named Jam. World Class Customer service by this lady made my stay great. Housekeeping takes their job serious because my room was VERY clean. Great job Residence Inn and their General Manager Gary who understands what it takes to educate his staff to provide great customer service. I'll be back!

owner_response.author: Farrah T, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking time to provide an awesome review of our property but most importantly of our staff. We take great pride in providing world class customer service and it's positive feed backs like this that continues to motivate and uplifts our dedicated staff. If your travels shall bring you back to the Shreveport-Bossier City area, we hope to have to welcome you once again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Most Comfortable Bed
data.text:
The staff of this hotel was very nice and very responsive.  We called about a broken lamp in our room and they sent the maintenance staff member immediately.  He said that the lamp had been broken for a while and then he left it.  It was not falling apart or anything but we wanted to make sure that we were not charged for the damage to the lamp as well.  The knob on the closet door in the bedroom area needed to be replaced as well.  

We thought that our room was a full kitchen which would include an oven but sadly it only included a microwave.  Since I needed the oven to finish baking a dish for our family reunion I had to take my baking to a family member's house but that was OK.  We should have checked beforehand to verify that there was an oven.

Our room in the hotel was very pretty.  One of the things that we did not like about it was the fact that there was no coffee table in front of the couch.  We thought that was very odd.  There was however a very nice table with chairs but nothing either on the side of the couch or in front.  

The bed in our room was one of the most comfortable beds we have ever slept in and lounged late every morning that we stayed there.  It was wonderful!  I would go back to this hotel just for the bed.

Since there was no bathtub I would have second thoughts about staying there.  The view from our hotel room was a parking lot of the very large hotel next door so we tended to keep our curtains closed for privacy sake.

Our room was quiet after a certain hour and we actually thought that since we were next door to such a large hotel that it would be very noisy but it was blessedly very peaceful.  

The room had a very modern feel and was very clean and their staff was wonderful!   Hats off to the staff and thank you very much.

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
gabakers,

Thank you so very much for that honest review!! I do apologize for the mishaps you encountered in your room during your visit. As all of our rooms offer a full kitchen, only one of our three room types include the full oven. The other two, one of which you housed during your visit, only have the stovetop.
We do hope to accommodate you again, for you to experience a better suited room including an oven! Thank you again for the review and this will be shared with the staff!

Travel Brilliantly
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Place to Stay
data.text: This is our 3rd time to stay here and there is no reason to stay anywhere else, in my opinion.  The rooms are absolutely beautiful, the beds are SO comfortable, and the location is perfect for shopping or walking on the Riverfront Boardwalk, restaurants or going to the casinos.  You feel like you are in a very nicely appointed condo. They offer a military discount which makes their already reasonable prices even more appealing.  Love this place!

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Charryp49,

WOW!!! Thank you so very much for this review! We are absolutely delighted to hear that you enjoy our hotel when traveling to the area. Thank you again, and we look forward to your future visits.

Travel Brilliantly,

Felicia Robinson
Front Office Supervisor
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: New!
data.text: The service was amazing. We were greeted each and every time we entered the building.   The rooms are huge and trendy. The kitchen was perfect.  Spotless and new!  I loved it. Close to the casino.  We just walked over to gamble.

owner_response.author: Farrah T, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for providing such a wonderful review of our property and more importantly of our friendly and amazing staff!  We take great pride in exceeding our customer's expectations and I am delighted to hear that we succeeded during your visit.  If your travels shall bring your back to the Shreveport-Bossier City area, please keep us in mind.  We would love to welcome you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Scrambled Eggs
data.text: I travel to Bossier City for business every other month, and always stay at this hotel.  It's very clean, and I feel safe here.  Its proximity to the casinos is a bonus if you're into that.  I think I'm placed on the same side of the hotel every time I stay here, and it can be kind-of noisy with the river traffic, but I travel with ear plugs for that reason.  There is usually a happy hour event with enough snacks to make a meal.  I have to talk about the breakfast since that's the title of my review.  I honestly can't remember all of the options--I would say the usual fare (toast, waffles, yogurt, fruit, etc.).  However the scrambled eggs are amazing.  They're creamy, but cooked, not rubbery or dry like must hotel breakfast eggs.  I've paid for eggs that are worse.

owner_response.author: Farrah T, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking time to share your experience with us. We are delighted to hear that we are your preferred hotel in the Shreveport-Bossier City area. 

In addition to providing clean and comfortable suites, it is also our mission to provide the very best in hospitality, whether it be through our complimentary hot breakfast or through our Residence Inn Mix social.  Our kitchen staff will be greatly encouraged through your compliments.  Thank you again and we look forward to serving you in the near future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wowed by this hotel!!
data.text: This hotel is way better than I could have imagined. I would give 10 stars if I could. Biggest hotel room I've ever had. I swear it's over 500 Sq feet. It's massive. Extremely clean and comfortable. The staff is amazing and friendly. It's a two minute walk from the Horseshoe Casino. Has a full kitchen in it. So you can save on eating out if you wish. I will only stay here from now on when we come to Bossier City. The breakfast is great too. Can't say enough good about this hotel. Best one I've ever stayed at.

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Kenneth S,

WOW!! That review is truly amazing. Thank you so much for those kind words about our hotel and staff! We are delighted to give our guests such a wonderful experience such as you described. We definitely look forward to you staying with us again!

Travel Brilliantly,

Felicia Robinson
Front Office Supervisor
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: About the friendliest place that I have stayed
data.text: This is a new Residence Inn. Less than a year old. Everything is rather new. This hotel is built in the newer style. The Boardwalk is walkable, and the Horseshoe is right out the back door.  They had the evening mix and served pasta,beer, and wine but we had already eaten.  A hot breakfast was served all of the staff seemed to know what to do. Comes with separate bedroom,sitting room, and kitchen.  A nice place to stay and would stay again.

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
catbird40319,

WOW!! Thank you so much for that review! I can tell that you made attention to all of our details. I'm delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit with us! We look forward to having you return whenever traveling to the Bossier City area.

Travel Brilliantly,

Felicia Robinson
Front Office Supervisor
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome hotel, awesome location
data.text: This hotel is really wonderful. It is obviously fairly new.  We had a studio room and it was very spacious. Our son had a one bedroom suite, which was the size of a small apartment.  Both were super clean and comfortable.  All of the staff (especially Ethel) were amazing.  Breakfast was not spectacular, but adequate for a quick bite.  The hotel is about a 5 minute walk from the Horseshoe Casino located  just behind it.  Would absolutely stay here again.  The rates are so much better than staying in the big casino hotels if staying on the weekend.   Highly recommend it.

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
R J,

Thank you so much for that amazing review!! Ethel is definitely a shining star and your comment will be shared with her and the staff. I'm glad to hear that you highly recommend us and we will be looking forward to serving you during your next trip back to Bossier City!

Travel Brilliantly,

Felicia Robinson
Front Office Supervisor
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Well maintained but the staff make the difference
data.text: This has now become my go to place when I stay in this part of the Shreveport. I believe this is my third or fourth time here. The place has a very new feel about it but it must be at least a couple years since it has opened. It is very well maintained. The rooms are excellent. Very roomy, well appointed for the price. I'm not sure if it is a Louisiana thing but the staff make all the difference. They are friendly, courteous and so very welcoming. Check-in is quick, everyone is always so very helpful. Nothing ever appears to be a problem. They're always willing to help. It is so very refreshing. What I find interesting is that this occurs at every level - the manager, the housekeeping staff and the kitchen staff. Everyone imbues a sense of satisfaction with their work and contentment to make your stay enjoyable. I don't typically use the gym or the pool but they cater for the physically challenged. The only warning is that the hotel is near the train line. Ask for a room near the front of the building and away from the train line side.

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Now this is an awesome review!! Thank you so much for those words, Finbar M. Each of our staff indeed takes pride in providing superior customer service! Needless to say, we take great care of our precious "home". Our hotel's 1 year anniversary will be this November!  I can't describe how delighted it is that you continue to choose us when visiting the Bossier City area. Thank you again for sharing your true feedback on our hotel and staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Travel Brilliantly,

Felicia Robinson
Front Office Supervisor
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice hotel right next to the Horseshoe Casino and Boardwalk!!
data.text: Hotel was very inviting and comfortable. The room was spacious and very clean. The only drawback was people from the casino are using the hotel parking lot at night and sneaking over to the casino. It didn't seem like they had enough security monitoring that. We enjoyed the pool and I must say the maintenance guy was pretty awesome about the fact that we mentioned there was an area of the pool that should be cleaned up. I sure wish I could have had one of the hamburgers he was cooking up LOL

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Puddles A,

We are so glad that the staff was very accommodating for you during your visit! Please accept our apologies for the issue with the casino guests using our parking lot. Rest assured we are developing an approach to ensure that our guests have no issue with finding and utilizing the parking at our facility.

Again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you soon!

Travel Brilliantly,

Felicia Robinson
Front Office Supervisor
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Birthday trip
data.text: Convenient location. Very nice room and friendly staff, beds are extremely uncomfortable...very hard! Everyone was extremely exhausted the next day from lack of sleep. Only had two washcloths in the suite but after a call they soon brought more.

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Annette H,

As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. We appreciate your honest feedback as it is with this that we are able to truly understand our guests and make proper adjustments to provide an 100% satisfied experience. 

Thank you for this feedback!

Felicia Robinson
Front Office Supervisor
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Family or Business Hotel
data.text: I stayed at this particular Residence Inn when it was first opened and was completely delighted at the customer service, interesting decor and gathering places in the lobby. At that time, I had a baby that was an infant (February 2016) and the front desk manager helped me and the baby to our room. He went over and above. I knew at that point this was going to be my "always" hotel in Shreveport area even though I had been faithfully staying at another boutique hotel. Recently, I stayed once again, and as usual everything was wonderful. Theo, one of the staff members, helped me with directions and we had a nice chat about Louisiana and what a good place it can be to raise a family. He really took the time to care about me as a customer and went over and above to make my day. I was able to work out in the cleanest gym I've ever experienced. Missed swimming, but want to try that some time too, as the hotel lends itself to R & R. A couple of critiques I might add - I love the suite rooms, but wish they weren't SOOO far down the hallway! And also, while the breakfast is just very nice, with clean area and well put together, it seems that the eggs are just not that great.  Would it be possible to crack some eggs in a skillet, rather than use the factory stuff? Not sure, but for we gluten-free protein eaters....this ranks pretty high.  Nevertheless, I will be back again and again. The staff is over and above fantastic.  Thank you so much!

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Brandi C,

AWESOME!! Thank you very much for choosing us as your home away from home. We are always thrilled to hear back from our guests, especially when they have enjoyed our hotel as much as you. We appreciate all of your feedback. We know the importance of listening to our guests as we are continuously looking to make the experience here more enjoyable. Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to your future stays with us!!

Travel Brilliantly.

Felicia Robinson
Front Office Supervisor
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Clean, Modern, Very comfy beds
data.text: Located in front of Harrah's Horseshoe, this hotel is a great alternative to the Horseshoe. Lovely room with Kitchen, stainless appliances, marble countertops, comfy bed, couch, desk, Large walk in shower. Great staff - very helpful and greeted me as I passed them. Free breakfast was really good with eggs, sausage patties, cereal, bagels, waffles, toast, fruit, coffee, 2 kinds of juice. My first time to visit and I will definitely be back.

owner_response.author: Tamika M, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear TexasRoadtripper,

Thank you for the Awesome review! We are so grateful you took the extra time to submit a TripAdvisor response. Thank you for summarizing our hotel and amenities quite perfectly! We could not be happier that the guest rooms, breakfast, and outstanding staff all exceeded your expectations! We strive to bring classic southern hospitality to life at the Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown and I am happy to hear that we succeeded! All the best and we can't wait until your next visit.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice clean rooms; great housekeeping staff!!
data.text: We only stayed at this hotel for one night. When we first booked it I was kind of skeptical because the price was so low. This by far was one of the best places I have ever stayed at. Chris from housekeeping is the BEST!!!! If I owned this property, he would be working the front desk. His attitude/personality is warm and welcoming. He was very nice and made sure that we were satisfied. Not only was he nice but the rooms were very clean. Shout out to the entire housekeeping team for all the hard work they're doing. It is paying off. The rooms were SPOTLESS!! If I ever visit Shreveport again, this would be my first choice of places to stay.

owner_response.author: Tamika M, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: mirandab77: Thank you for choosing our hotel and recognizing our staff for their exemplary assistance. We are very proud of our staff's commitment to service and we thank you for personally recognizing Chris. We are indeed very lucky to have such outstanding team members and it is our pride to share your comments as an example of genuine service with Chirs and our team. We value you as our guest and look forward to seeing you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Clean and Convenient to Shopping outlet
data.text: My family enjoyed our overnight stay here in July.  The desk attendant was very friendly and the room was roomy and clean.  We liked being right next to the shopping area and river.  The pool was nice when we took an evening swim.  The grounds and lobby area are modern and inviting.

owner_response.author: Tamika M, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear AleciaLester,

Thank you for the feedback and for staying with us when visiting the area. We are pleased that you were able to enjoy the hotel and the neighborhood. Our location is super convenient and with walk-able access to shopping, dining and entertainment it does offer a little something special to do. Please keep us top of mind whenever your travels bring you to Shreveport-Bossier City.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: New Facility, great staff
data.text: Stayed here for about 2 weeks with work. The facility is new, very clean and well maintained. The rooms have a nice kitchen setup, I cooked all my food in my room. the tv's have DIrect TV, all the sports channels including NFL Network. Theo the maintenance guy always made sure everything with my room was taken care of and regularly asked if there was anything i needed. Super friendly guy answered any questions I had, really enjoyed getting to know with him. Overall very nice hotel, would definately recommend

owner_response.author: Tamika M, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear typinto,
AMAZING!!Thank you very much for choosing us as your home away from home. We are always thrilled to hear back from our guests, especially when they have enjoyed our hotel as much as you. We appreciate your feedback. We know the importance of listening to our guests as we are continuously looking to make the experience here more enjoyable. Theo is an outstanding person, and we're thankful to have him as part of our team. Our entire team works hard and strive to exceed all of our guests expectations. We again thank you for this glowing review and for the recommendation. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you again soon.

Sincerely,

Tamika Miles
Assistant General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Burgers, Beers, Meat Pies and GOOD TIMES!!
data.text:
I was in town for work and spent two evenings in "The Mix," the evening event that features food and beer, presented by some of the kindest and personable staff I have ever met! Felicia (front desk), Felicia (security), Annette (front desk), and Theo (BURGERS!) all were exceptional. There was another big fella that was working The Mix...he changed the tank on the beer taps when they ran out...also an absolute good guy.  Lots of personality from the staff, and a beautiful property! Near the Outlets, Restaurants, and Movie Theater....a fantastic place to stay! Well lit parking, security on-site, and a complete sense of security in a comfortable room with a full kitchenette!

The only quirky "complaint" is that the elevator made a super creepy sound as it went up and down!! It was by design and was made to sound like a buoy bell. Someone needs to stuff that speaker with some MEAT PIES!!!

Theo grilled a mean burger and we shot the bull with several guests about current movies and MEAT PIE day was awesome!

Thanks Residence Inn!!

owner_response.author: Tamika M, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text: WOW!! Your comment is really, just WOW! Ryan R, thank you for being our guest and for taking the time to write a such a thoughtful review of our hotel. Theo, Felicia (front desk), Felicia (security) and Annette are indeed shining stars and I'm glad they shined bright to you during your visit. We appreciate the feedback as it helps let us know where we are exceeding expectations and where we need to focus to enhance your experience. We look forward to your next visit!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Highly recommend!
data.text: We stayed in a king suite for one night to break up a road trip. It was absolutely worth the $20 to get the suite and have a separate room for the kiddos. Tamika at check in was wonderfully welcoming. The outdoor area is great with a small pool, nice furniture, fire pit, and even a grilling area.  The whole hotel was very modern and clean.

owner_response.author: Felicia R, Manager at Residence Inn Shreveport-Bossier City/Downtown, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Katy L,

Thank you for that awesome review!! I'm so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed one of the larger suites, with the separate living areas as well as our outdoor area. Tamika is definitely one of a kind and we are so lucky to have her on board!! I will share your comment with her as well as the rest of the staff. Thank you again and we look forward to you on a return visit!

Travel Brilliantly,

Felicia Robinson
Front Office Supervisor
owner_response.title: Owner Response
